SELECT b_product.`b_product_id`, b_product.`b_product_name`, b_product.`b_category_id`, b_product.`b_brand_id`, b_product.`b_product_barcode`, b_product.`b_product_code`, b_product.`b_product_qr_code`, b_product.`b_product_status`, DATE_FORMAT(b_product.`b_product_ctime`,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS `b_product_ctime`, DATE_FORMAT(b_product.`b_product_mtime`,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS `b_product_mtime`, b_product.`xt_userinfo_id`, b_product.`b_product_model`, b_product.`b_product_model_name`, b_product.`b_product_color`, b_product.`b_product_features`, b_product.`b_product_origin`, b_product.`b_product_qualitylevel`, b_product.`b_product_gross_weight`, b_product.`b_product_net_weight`, b_product.`b_product_size_length`, b_product.`b_product_size_width`, b_product.`b_product_size_height`, xt_userinfo.`xt_userinfo_realName`, b_category.`b_category_name`, b_brand.`b_brand_name` FROM b_product b_product LEFT JOIN xt_userinfo xt_userinfo ON b_product.xt_userinfo_id = xt_userinfo.xt_userinfo_id LEFT JOIN b_brand b_brand ON b_product.b_brand_id = b_brand.b_brand_id LEFT JOIN b_category b_category ON b_category.b_category_id = b_product.b_category_id WHERE 1=1
AND instr(b_product.b_product_name,#{b_product_name})
AND b_product.b_product_status = #{b_product_status}
ORDER BY b_product.`b_product_ctime` DESC
